*These webhooks serve as the primary triggers that start the Freshdesk-YOUR_OPENAI_KEY_HERE-Linear synchronization process, automatically routing incoming ticket data to the field mapping stage.*

## üéØ API Operations & External Integration

*These nodes handle the core integration logic, ensuring reliable data exchange between platforms with proper authentication and error validation.*
